am_hal_uart.h File Reference

Hardware abstraction for the UART. More...

Detailed Description

Hardware abstraction for the UART.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>

Go to the source code of this file.

UART Flag Register

Macro definitions for UART Flag Register Bits. They may be used with the am_hal_uart_flags_get() function.

#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_TX_BUSY   UART0_FR_TXBUSY_Msk
 
#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_TX_EMPTY   UART0_FR_TXFE_Msk
